name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Activist investor renews call for Yahoo to sell core business

content: WASHINGTON  Oct 5 The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday left intact an appeals court decision that allowed a financial adviser to sue Charles Schwab Corp over allegations that the brokerage firm deviated from objectives set for a mutual fund  costing investors millions of dollars in losses.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: U.S. top court rejects Charles Schwab appeal in breach-of-contract dispute

title: Schwab to pay $2 million for net capital violations

title: UPDATE 1-Charles Schwab executive James McCool leaves products post

name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Charles Schwab executive James McCool leaves products post

content: Aug 24 A Charles Schwab Corp unit has agreed to a $2 million civil fine for failing to keep sufficient cash on hand to meet capital requirements on three separate days last year  Wall Street's industry-funded watchdog said on Monday.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Schwab to pay $2 million for net capital violations

content: NEW YORK Charles Schwab Corp will more than double its salesforce  add branches and may lower trading commissions when the U.S. Federal Reserve raises interest rates  but it will have to "tough out" the rest of 2015 if the economy remains "anemic " executives said on Friday.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Schwab to tough out rest of year  waiting for rate hike

content: NEW YORK Charles Schwab Corp plans to build its retail branch network so it can sell financial services to the so-called mass affluent market and wealthier investors who are not currently being solicited for business  company executives said Friday.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Schwab to double salesforce as targets high end of mass market

content: NEW YORK  July 24 Charles Schwab Corp  will more than double its salesforce  add branches and may lower trading commissions when the U.S. Federal Reserve raises interest rates  but it will have to "tough out" the rest of 2015 if the economy remains "anemic " executives said on Friday.

content: NEW YORK Charles Schwab Corp. on Thursday reported net income of $353 million for its second quarter  up 9 percent from a year earlier and 17 percent from this year's first quarter on growth of asset-based fees that offset a decline in client trading.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Schwab profit up 9 percent on fees and interest revenue

content: NEW YORK  July 24 Charles Schwab Corp  and its discount brokerage competitors will compete more intensely for customers once the Federal Reserve raises interest rates  Chief Executive Walt Bettinger said Friday.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Schwab CEO says brokers may compete through price for customers

content: NEW YORK  July 24 If interest rates do not rise over the next few months and trading volume does not increase  Charles Schwab Corp expects its net income to decline the rest of the year  Chief Financial Officer Joe Martinetto said on Friday.

title: Schwab costs may rise faster than revenue rest of year -CFO

content: NEW YORK  July 24 Charles Schwab Corp  plans to rapidly build its retail branch network so it can sell financial plans and services to mass affluent and wealthier investors who are not being solicited for business  company executives said Friday.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Schwab to add branches  advisers and sales assistants

content: NEW YORK  July 24 Charles Schwab Corp  and its discount brokerage competitors may cut commission prices in order to get access to customer cash once the U.S. Federal Reserve raises interest rates  Chief Executive Walt Bettinger said on Friday.

title: UPDATE 1-Schwab CEO says brokers may compete through price for customers

content: NEW YORK  July 7 Wealthfront  one of the biggest of a new breed of investment management firms known as "robo-advisors " on Tuesday lowered the minimum investment customers must make to open an account  to $500 from $5 000.

title: Robo-advisor Wealthfront lowers account minimum to $500

content: NEW YORK Charles Schwab Corp said on Wednesday that its first-quarter net income fell 7 percent to $302 million on slower client trading activity and higher spending focused in part on the discount brokerage's new robo-adviser offering.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Charles Schwab first quarter profit down 7 percent on higher costs  fewer trades

content: NEW YORK  April 15 Charles Schwab Corp  said on Wednesday that its first-quarter net income fell 7 percent to $302 million on slower client trading activity and higher spending focused in part on the discount brokerage's new robo-adviser offering.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Charles Schwab Q1 profit down 7 pct on higher costs  fewer trades

content: NEW YORK  April 15 Charles Schwab Corp  a pioneer discount stock brokerage  said its first-quarter net income fell 7 percent from the year-earlier period to $302 million on slower client trading activity and higher spending focused largely on its new robo-adviser offering  Schwab Intelligent Portfolios.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Charles Schwab Q1 profit down 7 pct on higher costs  fewer trades

content: NEW YORK  March 27 Walter Bettinger  president and chief executive of Charles Schwab Corp  earned $11.8 million in cash  options and restricted stock awards in 2014  7 percent below the $12.7 million he was paid in 2013.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: Pay for top Charles Schwab Corp execs fell 5-10 percent in 2014

content: NEW YORK Citadel Securities  a top market maker in U.S. stocks and listed options  plans to shutter its Apogee "dark pool" to focus on another of its off-exchange stock trading venues called Citadel Connect  according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.

title: Citadel Securities to close Apogee 'dark pool': sources

content: March 13 Financial advisory firms are so busy trying to prevent computer hacking that they sometimes neglect an equally vital issue: what to do when hackers succeed.
name: The Charles Schwab Corporation
title: COMPLY-Hackers trigger panic  missteps when advisers fail to plan

content: A U.S. appeals court on Monday revived a class-action lawsuit accusing Charles Schwab Corp of stuffing risky mortgage-backed securities into a bond index mutual fund  causing the fund to significantly lag its benchmark.

title: Charles Schwab must face U.S. lawsuit over bond index fund

content: Charles Schwab Corp reported earnings of $350 million in the last quarter of 2014 as higher interest income and $33 billion of new client assets supplemented modest gains in client trading revenue during a bullish quarter for stocks.
